name: swagger-spec-validator
description: Validate an OpenAPI/Swagger API specification using the swagger.io online validator.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.doc: npm run doc-js && npm run doc-spec
scripts.doc-spec: rimraf doc/spec && mkdir doc/spec && mocha --reporter doc --recursive test | nodecat doc-src/spec/header.xhtml - doc-src/spec/footer.xhtml > doc/spec/index.xhtml
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && npm run lint-doc
scripts.lint-doc: jsdoc -t templates/silent -c jsdoc-lint.conf.json . && echo JSDoc passed.
scripts.postpublish: git -C doc push && git push --follow-tags origin master gh-pages && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: rimraf doc && git clone -b gh-pages -l -q . doc && npm run doc && git -C doc add . && git -C doc commit -n -m "Docs for v$npm_package_version"
scripts.preversion: npm run test-cov && nyc check-coverage --statements 90 && check-audit && depcheck --ignore-dirs doc && david && git-branch-is master && travis-status -b master -c -w -x && appveyor-status -b master -c -w -p kevinoid/swagger-spec-validator
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-cov: npm run lint && npm run test-unit-cov
scripts.version: npm run changelog && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install conventional-changelog-cli david depcheck git-branch-is npm-audit-resolver travis-status
